channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: As Trump cracks down on college student visas, other countries see opportunity
item.description: As part of its crackdown on immigration, President Donald Trump’s administration is pressuring U.S. colleges to reduce their dependence on international enrollment while adding new layers of scrutiny for foreign students.

item.title: Trump’s redistricting fight could broaden and last a while with Texas and California as epicenters
Texas governor asks court to remove House Democratic leader from office over walkout
